knimeNode.name: Message Slack User (beta)
knimeNode.shortDescription: Send a direct message to a KNIME user
Send a slack message to a designated user.

fullDescription.intro:
Send the given message to the specified user on execution. No input table needs to be specified, if one is given it is passed through verbatim.
Unfortunately the display name in Slack is not unique. So the @{username} value you may use is not directly usable within this node as the username. Instead you must find the user's ID (e.g. looking it up int he Get Users node) and provide this.
fullDescription.option: The OAth token of the bot to post as
The user to post to. This value can be found in the ID column of the output table of the Get Users node.
Node will fail terminating workflow branch if checked. Uncheck to continue workflow if message can't be sent

ports.outPort: The verbatim input table or an empty table if no input provided.
